    • Leader [140pts]

      • Arkanaut Admiral [140pts]

        Selections: Battle Regiment - 1 Commander, General, Masterwork Volley Pistol, Skalfhammer

        Categories: ARKANAUT ADMIRAL, DUARDIN, HERO, SKYFARER, KHARADRON OVERLORDS, ORDER, Leader, 9 or less wounds Leader, Champion, General, 6_under_wounds

        Command Abilities: Bring Every Gun to Bear!, Command the Skies, Unit: Arkanaut Admiral, Unit Abilities: Grudgebreaker Rounds, The Admiral's Flagship, Weapon: Masterwork Volley Pistol, Skalfhammer


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Bring Every Gun to Bear! You can use this command ability at the start of your shooting phase. The unit that receives the command must be a friendly SKYVESSEL that is more than 3" from all enemy units, that remained stationary in the preceding movement phase and that did not receive the Fly High command in the preceding movement phase. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit's missile weapons until the end of the phase.
        Command the Skies You can use this command ability at the start of your movement phase. The unit that receives the command must be a friendly SKYVESSEL more than 3" from all enemy units. That unit can re-roll run rolls this phase. In addition, that unit can run and still shoot and/or charge later in the turn.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Arkanaut Admiral 4"683+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Grudgebreaker Rounds Once per battle, at the start of your shooting phase, pick 1 friendly KHARADRON OVERLORDS unit that is not a SKYVESSEL and that is wholly within 12" of this unit. Until the end of the phase, improve the Rend characteristic of that unit's missile weapons by 1. The same unit cannot be picked to benefit from this ability more than once per phase.
        The Admiral's Flagship If this unit is the general of a Kharadron Overlords army, you can pick 1 ARKANAUT IRONCLAD or ARKANAUT FRIGATE in the army to be its flagship. Record this information on your army roster. Once per turn, this unit can issue a command to its flagship without a command point being spent.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Masterwork Volley Pistol Missile9"33+3+-12
        Skalfhammer Melee1"33+2+-23

        Arkanaut Company 4"164+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Champion 1 model in this unit can be a Company Captain. That model is armed with an Aetherflare Pistol or Volley Pistol instead of a Privateer Pistol.
        Glory-seekers While this unit is not embarked, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit that target a unit contesting an objective.
        Light Skyhook The Damage characteristic of this unit's Light Skyhook is 3 if the target of the attack is a MONSTER.

      • Arkanaut Frigate [300pts]

        Selections: Aethershot Carbines, Boarding Weapons, Heavy Sky Cannon, Wound Track

        Categories: ARKANAUT FRIGATE, DUARDIN, SKYVESSEL, WAR MACHINE, KHARADRON OVERLORDS, ORDER, Behemoth, TRANSPORT VESSEL, Battleline

        Frigate Wound Track: 00-05, 06-09, 10-12, 13+, Unit: Arkanaut Frigate, Unit Abilities: Assault Boat, Bomb Racks, Bulwarks of Iron, Heavy Sky Cannon, Transport Vessel, Weapon: Aethershot Carbines, Boarding Weapons, Heavy Sky Cannon: Shell, Heavy Sky Cannon: Shrapnel


        Frigate Wound Track Ramming DiceBoarding WeaponsBomb Racks Ref
        00-05 868
        06-09 756
        10-12 644
        13+ 534
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Arkanaut Frigate 12"1583+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Assault Boat After this unit finishes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this unit and roll a number of dice equal to the Ramming Dice value shown on this unit's damage table. For each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. Then, you can pick any friendly units embarked in this unit to disembark. Units that disembark in this way must be set up within 3" of an enemy unit and count as having made a charge move. In addition, in the following combat phase, the strike-first effect applies to units that disembarked in this way.
        Bomb Racks After this unit finishes a normal move or a run, you can pick 1 enemy unit that this unit passed across and roll a number of dice equal to the Bomb Racks value shown on this unit's damage table. For each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. This ability has no effect on units that can fly.
        Bulwarks of Iron This unit counts as 5 models for the purposes of contesting objectives.
        Heavy Sky Cannon Each time this unit shoots, choose either the Shrapnel or Shell missile weapon characteristics for all the attacks is makes with its Heavy Sky Cannon.
        Transport Vessel This unit can fly. In addition, up to 12 SKYFARER models can be embarked in it. If this unit is part of an army that is not a Kharadron Overlords army, it can still use the Sky-fleets battle trait. Battletome: Kharadron Overlords 2023 p91

    • Other [460pts]

      • Endrinriggers [120pts]

        Selections: 3 Endrinriggers [120pts], Aethermatic Volley Gun & Gun Butt, Battle Regiment - 2-5 Troops, 2x Rapid-fire Rivet Gun and Aethermatic Saw

        Categories: DUARDIN, ENDRINRIGGERS, SKYFARER, KHARADRON OVERLORDS, ORDER, Other, Infantry

        Unit: Endrinriggers, Unit Abilities: Champion, Emergency Field Repairs, Fly, Weapon: Aethermatic Saw, Aethermatic Volley Gun, Gun Butt, Rapid-fire Rivet Gun


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Endrinriggers 12"274+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Champion 1 model in this unit can be a Mizzenmaster. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.
        Emergency Field Repairs Once per turn, at the end of any phase, if this unit is more than 3" from all enemy units, you can say that this unit will carry out emergency field repairs. If you do so, pick 1 friendly SKYVESSEL within 3" of this unit and roll a dice for each model in this unit. Each of these rolls is called a field repairs roll. For each 4-5, you can heal 1 wound allocated to that SKYVESSEL. For each 6+, you can heal 2 wounds instead.
        Fly This unit can fly.

        Grundstok Gunhauler 12"1073+

        Ahead Full Once per battle, at the start of your movement phase, you can say that this model will move ahead full. If you do so, add 6" to the Move characteristic of this model in that phase.
        Bomb Racks After this unit finishes a normal move or a run, you can pick 1 enemy unit that this unit passed across and roll 4 dice. For each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. This ability has no effect on units that can fly.
        Escort Vessel Friendly SKYVESSELS other than GRUNDSTOK GUNHAULERS have a ward of 6+ while they are within 3" of any friendly GRUNDSTOK GUNHAULERS.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Kharadron Overlords

          Selections: Always Take What You Are Owed, Barak-Zilfin, the Windswept City, Honour is Everything, There's No Reward Without Risk

          1) Artycle: Honour is Everything, 2) Amendment: Always Take What You Are Owed, 3) Footnote: There's No Reward Without Risk, Battle Trait: Disembarking, Embarking, Magnificent Skyvessels, Command Abilities: Combat Landing, Disengage, Fly High


        1) Artycle Details Ref
        Honour is Everything When a friendly KHARADRON OVERLORDS unit receives the Rally command (core rules, 7.2), you can return 1 slain model to the unit for each 4+ instead of each 6.
        2) Amendment Details Ref
        Always Take What You Are Owed At the start of your hero phase, pick 1 friendly ARKANAUT COMPANY unit. Until the start of your next hero phase, each model in that unit counts a 2 models instead of 1 for the purposes of contesting objectives. Battletome: Kharadron Overlords 2023 p63
        3) Footnote Details Ref
        There's No Reward Without Risk Once per battle, in your charge phase, you can attempt a charge with 1 friendly KHARADRON OVERLORDS unit within 18" of an enemy unit. If you do so, roll 3D6 for the charge roll instead of 2D6.
        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Disembarking In your movement phase, if a friendly SKYFARER unit is embarked in a TRANSPORT VESSEL that has not yet moved in that phase, you can say that the SKYFARER unit will disembark. If you do so, set up that SKYFARER unit wholly within 3" of that TRANSPORT VESSEL and more than 3" from all enemy units. A unit that disembarks in this way can still move in the same turn.

        If a friendly TRANSPORT VESSEL is destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a number of dice equal to the number of models embarked in it. For each roll of 1, 1 embarked model is slain (you choose which models are slain). Then, all units embarked in that TRANSPORT VESSEL must immediately disembark before it is removed from play.

        When a unit disembarks, if a models cannot be set up wholly within 3" of the TRANSPORT VESSEL in which it is embarked and more than 3" from all enemy units, it is slain.
        Embarking During deployment, instead of setting up a SKYFARER unit on the battlefield, you can say that it is embarked in a friendly TRANSPORT VESSEL that is already on the battlefield. If you do so, place that SKYFARER unit to one side.

        In addition, in the movement phase, if a friendly SKYFARER unit finishes a move wholly within 3" of a friendly TRANSPORT VESSEL and both of those units are more than 3" from all enemy units, you can say that the TRANSPORT VESSEL will embark that SKYFARER unit. If you do so, remove that SKYFARER unit from the battlefield and place it to one side.

        Each TRANSPORT VESSEL has a limit on the number of models it can embark. A TRANSPORT VESSEL cannot embark a unit if doing so would exceed this limit.

        While a unit is embarked in a TRANSPORT VESSEL, the following rules apply:

        * Embarked units are still treated as being on the battlefield. Range and visibility to and from models in an embarked unit are instead measured to and from the TRANSPORT VESSEL in which the unit is embarked. In addition, for the purposes of determining visibility, models in an embarked unit are treated as models that can fly.

        * Embarked units are in cover. In addition, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target embarked units.

        * Models in an embarked unit cannot contest objectives.

        * Embarked units cannot move. However, when a TRANSPORT VESSEL finishes any type of move, all units embarked in are considered to have made the same type of move.

        *When a TRANSPORT VESSEL finishes a charge move, the TRANSPORT VESSEL, any units embarked in it, and any units that disembark from it as a result of that charge move (e.g. by using the ‘Assault Boat’ ability) are all treated as 1 unit for the purposes of determining whether an enemy unit is eligible to receive the Unleash Hell command. If a unit then receives the Unleash Hell command, its commanding player can pick any 1 of the units that made the charge move to be the target of all of the shooting attacks.
        Magnificent Skyvessels You can pick 1 additional Great Endrinwork for your army.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Combat Landing You can use this command ability at the end of your movement phase. The unit that receives the command must be a friendly TRANSPORT VESSEL. Any units embarked in that TRANSPORT VESSEL can immediately disembark. A unit that disembarks in this way cannot move in the same turn. Battletome: Kharadron Overlords 2023 p63
        Disengage You can use this command ability in your movement phase. The unit that receives the command must be a friendly SKYVESSEL that has not yet moved in that phase. That unit and any units embarked in it can retreat and still shoot later in the turn. Battletome: Kharadron Overlords 2023 p63
        Fly High You can use this command ability at the end of your movement phase. The unit that receives the command must be a friendly SKYVESSEL more than 3" from all enemy units. Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units and more than 1" from all terrain features. Battletome: Kharadron Overlords 2023 p63

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 1000 Points - Vanguard

        Categories: Game Options, Vanguard

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Rule the Skies

        Categories: Game Options, Grand Strategy

        Grand Strategy: Rule the Skies


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Rule the Skies When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there are 1 or more friendly SKYVESSELS on the battlefield and there are no enemy Behemoths that can fly on the battlefield.
